alert.note: Alert for Lincoln (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 13 at 5:37PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Lincoln County through 615 PM CDT... At 536 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles north of Wallace, or 23 miles southwest of North Platte, moving north at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Sutherland Reservoir State Recreation Area around 550 PM CDT. Sutherland and Hershey around 555 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Coker, O`Fallons and Birdwood. This includes the following highways... Highway 97 between mile markers 1 and 14. Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 153 and 174. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
